__e: And maybe it took me 20 years to see it, but I do now... I see it!
Secondly, I think it's time that you knew the real me.
Are you sure you want to before you understand your true self?
It is said that hate made her forget her true nature as a mother.
I'm sorry you had to witness her true nature today.
I didn't say no one would die. Simply that I would return man to its true nature.
I want to get down to the true story for once, while you're available, before anything happens to you.
You know what I think the real story is here?
Would you like me to tell you the real story?
I think I need to talk to our one true God.
He's not my one true god.
After you die, you wouldn't really be dead providing you have accepted him as the one and only God.
Well, if somehow, with all that, he is her true love, then...
Think of all the time you have to meet your true love.
I don't know if I ever told you this... but your father... was my first... and only... true love...
To show you who are your true and only friends, to eliminate your false confidence, and to prove that those elders of yours hiding in the woods have less hold over you than I.
My beloved daughter, The one true good thing I have done in this life, And you claim to be the one who corrupted her?
